name: CEDARBROOK NURSING HOMES, Elm Terrace Gardens, Fair Acres Geriatric Center, et al., Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE
name_abbreviation: Cedarbrook Nursing Homes v. Pennsylvania Department of Public Welfare

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: CEDARBROOK NURSING HOMES, Elm Terrace Gardens, Fair Acres Geriatric Center, et al., Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gerald Gornish, Philadelphia, for Cedarbrook Nursing Homes.
John A. Kane, Mary Frances Grabowski, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Dept, of Public Welfare.
casebody.head_matter:
622 A.2d 282
CEDARBROOK NURSING HOMES, Elm Terrace Gardens, Fair Acres Geriatric Center, et al., Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1993.
Decided Feb. 17, 1993.
Gerald Gornish, Philadelphia, for Cedarbrook Nursing Homes.
John A. Kane, Mary Frances Grabowski, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Dept, of Public Welfare.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
